posts.post_content:
I'm looking to upgrade some of the portraits I do have and acquire ones I don't have, which is numerous.

I can purchase cards outright or trade for other cards if so desired.  Graded or raw is perfectly fine.

Please email me at [url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url] if you should have any.  Thank you.

I'm pleased to say I acquired 1 new portrait and 1 upgrade so far. Anyone else interested? Anyone on the fence? I'm paying strong for the ones I need.  Send me an email and I'm sure we'll come to a mutually satisfying agreement.
